name: On the Hunt
description:
On the Hunt is an open world hunting game in development. It's a combination of FPS and stealth. It's still in early prototype phase. Build with open source game engine https://mikulasflorek.itch.io/...

Controls:

Mouse - rotate camera

Left mouse button - fire

Right mouse button - aim

W, S, A, D - movement

Shift - run

C - crouch

I - inventory

Esc - menu
